hero_title: AVAMARINE ‚Äì confidence and precision on every wave
intro_heading: AVAMARINE ‚Äì confidence and precision on every wave
intro_text1: AVAMARINE is a brand born from a passion for sailing and a deep understanding of the needs of those who expect reliability, control, and full support on the water.
intro_text2: Known for excellent maneuverability, exceptional stability, and reliable handling in all sea conditions, AVAMARINE is the choice of professionals.
features_title: What makes our boats stand out?
feature1: Flat cockpit ‚Äì maximum working space and freedom of movement.
feature2: Dry deck ‚Äì comfort in tougher conditions, bilge pumps, high transom.
feature3: V-shaped hull and high bow ‚Äì dry and stable ride even in heavy chop.
feature4: Coach safety ‚Äì ergonomic steering position, stable construction.
intro_end: Our RIBs combine practical design with modern technology ‚Äì built to perform reliably and support the development of sailing talent.
product_480_p1: The AVA 4.80 (480 cm) RIB is an excellent choice for sailing schools organizing summer camps, providing safety and comfort for both children and instructors.
product_480_p2: Thanks to its compact design, excellent maneuverability, and stability, it is ideal for securing young sailors during water activities.
product_480_p3: The recommended engine power of 30‚Äì40 HP offers sufficient dynamics to respond quickly and ensure the safety of camp participants, while maintaining stability.
product_480_p4: The AVA 4.80 is a reliable unit that performs excellently in the everyday operations of sailing schools, ensuring comfort and safety during summer water activities.
product_515_p1: The Garda AVA 5.15 (515 cm) RIB is a compact and highly functional inflatable boat designed for training the youngest sailors in the Optimist class.
product_515_p2: With its stable design, light maneuverability, and well-balanced dimensions, it‚Äôs perfect as a coaching boat for both training and regatta support.
product_515_p3: The recommended 40 HP engine provides dynamic movement between trainees while maintaining control and safety.
product_515_p4: The AVA 5.15 is an excellent choice for sailing clubs and coaches focused on safe and effective instruction of young sailors.
product_540_p1: The Garda AVA 5.40 (540 cm) RIB is a versatile and reliable inflatable boat, designed specifically for coaching youth sailors in pre-Olympic classes such as the 29er, 420, and ILCA.
product_540_p2: With its rigid hull, robust construction, and excellent maneuverability, it offers safety and full control even in challenging conditions.
product_540_p3: The 5.4-meter length ensures great stability and ample working space, while the recommended 50 HP engine allows for quick and effective response during training sessions.
product_540_p4: It's the ideal choice for sailing clubs and coaches who aim to provide top-level support on the water.
product_580_p1: The Olympic AVA 5.80 (580 cm) RIB is a modern, well-refined design created specifically for demanding Olympic campaigns.
product_580_p2: Its extended, spacious cockpit offers coaches a comfortable working environment with ample room for essential gear and supplies during long training sessions.
product_580_p3: The robust 5.8-meter hull performs exceptionally well in the challenging conditions typical of Olympic racing venues.
product_580_p4: With a recommended engine power of 70 HP, it provides the speed and responsiveness needed to keep up with even the fastest classes.
product_580_p5: Olympic AVA 5.80 is the go-to choice for professionals working with Olympic classes such as 49er, 470, ILCA, Formula Kite, iQFOiL, and Nacra 17, where reliability, space, and performance are critical.
product_590_p1: The AVA 5.90 AL RIB with an aluminum hull is the perfect vessel for rescuers and those operating in shallow waters such as beaches or islands.
product_590_p2: The aluminum construction makes it resistant to underwater obstacles, and the added weight provides increased stability during operation and while stationary on rough seas ‚Äì a feature highly valued by rescuers.
product_590_p3: The recommended 70 HP engine ensures sufficient power for quick response in any situation.
product_590_p4: The 5.90 AL model combines the durability of aluminum with the maneuverability of a RIB, making it a reliable choice for rescue operations in challenging conditions.
product_590_p5: The AVA 5.90 AL is a stable, mobile unit that excels in nearshore areas, providing safety and effectiveness during rescue missions.
product_630_p1: The AVA 6.30 (630 cm) RIB is a high-performance, versatile unit designed to support Olympic campaigns, while also perfectly suited for regatta management and rescue operations.
product_630_p2: Its extended length and solid hull construction provide outstanding stability, generous working space, and dependable performance in challenging weather conditions.
product_630_p3: With a recommended engine power of 100 HP, the AVA 6.30 delivers fast and responsive maneuverability essential for professional use.
product_630_p4: One of the standout features of this model is its extensive customization potential ‚Äì from cockpit layout and seating arrangements to tailored equipment configurations, it can be fully adapted to meet the specific needs of coaches, race officials, or rescue teams.
product_630_p5: For race officials, the AVA 6.30 is a reliable, adaptable platform built for professionals who demand both performance and flexibility needed in Olympic campaigns.
contact_text: Get in touch with us ‚Äì we‚Äôll be happy to answer all your questions about our boats, charter offers, and cooperation with sailing clubs.

product_525_p1: The AVA 5.25 AL (525 cm) RIB with an aluminium hull is a perfect unit for rescue operations and shallow water work such as beaches, islands and coastal areas.
product_525_p2: The aluminium hull provides excellent resistance to underwater obstacles, while the added weight improves stability ‚Äî essential for lifeguards working in waves.
product_525_p3: The recommended 70 HP engine ensures fast and effective response in emergencies.
product_525_p4: The 5.25 AL model combines the durability of aluminium with the agility of a RIB, delivering reliability in demanding operational conditions.
product_525_p5: It is a stable, durable and highly manoeuvrable boat, ideal for rescue tasks and coastal operations.
